AppIcon.Description: Path to AppIcon.icns file. The size should be 16x16,32x32,128x128, or 256x256. Defaults to none.

AppName.Description: Name of the Application Bundle. This change will reflect in the Info.plist and the name of the binary in Contents/MacOS/.

Architecture.Description: Architecture to use. x86 or x64

Language.Description: Language of the stager to generate.

OutFile.Description: path to output Empire application. The application will be saved to a zip file.

SafeChecks.Description: Switch. Checks for LittleSnitch or a SandBox, exit the staging process if true. Defaults to True.

UserAgent.Description: User-agent string to use for the staging request (default, none, or other).
